Class AbstractGameState

    public abstract class AbstractGameState
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
    A GameState that uses delta time in seconds, not milliseconds.
    Author:
    Dan Wager

        Update the state's logic based on the amount of time that has passed.
        Parameters:
        gc - The game's container
        game - The game that holds this state
        dt - The amount of time that has passed in seconds since the last update
